name: Rufus OLIVER III, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Oliver v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Rufus OLIVER III, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of May, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
850 A.2d 617
Rufus OLIVER III, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 4, 2004.
